column2: I asked our waiter for any recommendations and his answer was "whatever you want to eat". The menu here is EXTENSIVE
column3: guys. There is absolutely no freaking way they can possibly make every item on the menu perfect
column5: there are obviously some dishes that are better than others. Thanks for the help mate
column6: you really helped me narrow down my choices. He did keep my water glass full for the most part...ish.
